template.subject: Thank You for Your Generous Support of Emergency Relief!
template.body:
We are deeply grateful for your exceptional generosity toward our Emergency Relief campaign. 
Your contribution of over $283 places you among our most valued supporters.

Thanks to donors like you, we have already raised $12,750 toward our 
goal of $50,000 - that's 25.5% complete!

Your support is making a real difference in the lives of Haitian families. Every dollar helps 
provide essential services, hope, and a brighter future.

We would love to keep you updated on how your donation is being used. Would you be interested 
in receiving a personalized impact report?

With heartfelt gratitude,
The HFRP Team
template.footer: Haitian Family Relief Project | Bringing Hope to Haiti

template.subject: Thank You for Your Generous Support of Education Fund!
template.body:
We are deeply grateful for your exceptional generosity toward our Education Fund campaign. 
Your contribution of over $318 places you among our most valued supporters.

Thanks to donors like you, we have already raised $8,900 toward our 
goal of $25,000 - that's 35.6% complete!

Your support is making a real difference in the lives of Haitian families. Every dollar helps 
provide essential services, hope, and a brighter future.

We would love to keep you updated on how your donation is being used. Would you be interested 
in receiving a personalized impact report?

With heartfelt gratitude,
The HFRP Team
template.footer: Haitian Family Relief Project | Bringing Hope to Haiti
